# dependency-install-helper

Guide installation of project dependencies and toolchains. Use when a junior developer is stuck setting up the environment.

## Quick Facts
- id: `dependency-install-helper--6c0e74c437`
- worth_using_score: `20/100`
- tags: `ci`
- source: `codex_skills`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/.codex/skills/dependency-install-helper/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Identify required runtime versions and package managers.
- Provide install commands for the platform.
- Call out common setup pitfalls and verification steps.
